# cmccloudv2_iam_custom_role (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# get custom role by name
data "cmccloudv2_iam_custom_role" "crdev" {
    name = "cr-dev"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Filter by full custom role name

### Read-Only

- `created` (String) Created time of role
- `description` (String) Description of role
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
